name: BirthWeight
title: Birth Weight
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent codes for newborn's birth weight.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment category. The intent of this data element is to identify newborn's birth weight.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with LOINC codes that identify newborn's birth weight.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
